Container.Name: atd
Container.Description: Automated Tidal Downloader :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client
Container.Overview: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']NOT FOR PUBLIC USE YET...[/span][/u][/b][br][br]Automated Tidal Downloader :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: Script Interval
Config.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Config.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

Config.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10

Config.Name: Lidarr Url
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Config.Name: Lidarr API Key
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...
